title: Bitcoin ETF Flows Turn Positive, But Experts Warn of Defensive Shift
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs saw inflows of $75 million, ending a five-day rout as experts see institutions defensively repositioning amid a market retreat.

title: Bitcoin Core’s first public third-party audit finds no major vulnerabilities
contentSnippet: Cybersecurity firm Quarkslab has completed the first public, third-party security audit of the Bitcoin Core codebase.

title: Seller Fatigue?: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 20, 2025

title: AI and HPC Bitcoin Miners Surge Pre Market Following Stellar NVIDIA Earnings
contentSnippet: Strong NVIDIA guidance lifts pre market sentiment across bitcoin miners while NAKA delivers delayed Q3 losses.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Holds Steady Amid Wave of Sell Pressure as Altcoins Slide
contentSnippet: A long-term BTC holder moved hundreds of millions to exchanges, but the market absorbed the supply shock as altcoins suffered broad declines.

title: Abu Dhabi Investment Tripled IBIT Holdings in Q3 as Bitcoin Headed to Record High
contentSnippet: The company sees bitcoin as a store of value, similar to gold, a spokesperson told Bloomberg.

title: RippleX engineer explores potential for native XRP staking as David Schwartz weighs in on future XRPL design
contentSnippet: RippleX developer J. Ayo Akinyele and outgoing Ripple CTO David Schwartz outlined how native staking could work on XRPL.

title: Markets in Late-Cycle Phase, Not Recessionary: QCP
contentSnippet: With the broader market “firmly past the early-cycle phase,” analysts see a bottoming process underway for Bitcoin.

title: Ark Invest Buys the Slide, Adds Almost $40M of Crypto Stocks, as Market Drops
contentSnippet: Cathie Wood's investment manager added to its holdings of Bullish (BLSH), Circle Internet (CRCL) and Bitmine (BMNR) as all three companies' stock prices fell.

title: GANA Payment exploited for over $3.1 million on BNB Smart Chain: ZachXBT
contentSnippet: GANA crashed over 90% after hackers reportedly stole $3.1 million from the BNB Smart Chain-based protocol.

title: Spot bitcoin ETFs return to positive flows, BTC recovers above $92,000
contentSnippet: Notably, BlackRock's IBIT saw $60.61 million in positive flows, after recording $523 million in net outflows on Tuesday.

title: Ark Invest buys more Circle, Bullish and BitMine as stocks fall sharply
contentSnippet: The drop in crypto-related stocks coincided with a broader crypto market pullback, with bitcoin currently trading at $91,795.

title: BlackRock Takes First Step Toward a Staked Ether ETF
contentSnippet: A new Delaware filing for the iShares Staked Ethereum Trust signals BlackRock’s intent to enter the yield-bearing ether market as issuers wait for SEC clarity on staking.

title: Fed December Rate Cut Odds Collapse to 30%
contentSnippet: The probability of the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates has decreased significantly, now standing at 30%.

title: Privacy-Focused Aztec Network's Ignition Chain Lights Up on Ethereum
contentSnippet: Aztec Network launched its Ignition Chain, becoming the first fully decentralized Layer 2 protocol on Ethereum's mainnet.

title: India's Debt-Backed ARC Token Eyes Tentative Q1 2026 Debut, Sources Say
contentSnippet: The ARC will operate within a two-tier framework, complementing the RBI's Central Bank Digital Currency.

title: Dogecoin Hits Multi-Month Lows as Exchange Flows Turn Bullish for First Time in 6 Months
Core Foundation secures injunction blocking Maple Finance’s rival bitcoin yield product
contentSnippet: Core claims that Maple used confidential information in their partnership to develop a competing product, violating the exclusivity clause.

title: Trump Eyes Executive Order to Rein In Patchwork State AI Policies
contentSnippet: The White House is pushing for a federal framework as Hill Republicans explore attaching a moratorium to the defense bill.

title: Ripple Weighs Staking Overhaul to Expand XRP’s Role in DeFi
contentSnippet: Ripple is exploring whether native staking could enhance the XRP Ledger’s security and utility without compromising its core consensus model.

title: Aztec launches privacy-focused L2 Ignition Chain on mainnet following token sale
contentSnippet: Aztec says Ignition Chain, which enables programmable privacy, is the first fully decentralized Layer 2 network on Ethereum.

title: Samourai Wallet CTO William Hill Sentenced to Four Years in Prison
contentSnippet: The developer will serve 48 months for running an unlicensed money transmitter, after his co-founder received five years earlier this month.

title: Bitwise spot XRP ETF launches Thursday amid altcoin fund rush
contentSnippet: The rush of new altcoin ETFs in the U.S. came after the SEC clarified procedures for firms seeking to roll out crypto ETFs.

title: Circle, Bitcoin Treasuries Lead Crypto Stock Losses Amid Bitcoin Headwinds
contentSnippet: Digital asset-focused stocks fell on Wednesday as Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies extended losses, even as tech stocks steadied.

title: NASA Insists Interstellar Visitor Is ‘Just a Comet’ as Public Speculation Lingers
contentSnippet: Agency officials said data showed nothing unusual about Comet 3I Atlas despite weeks of speculation.

title: BlackRock Forms New Trust Amid Early Uptake of Staking-Focused Ethereum ETFs
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s new trust adds momentum to a growing push among issuers to bring staking-enabled Ethereum products into U.S. markets.

title: Cipher, IREN and more bitcoin mining stocks get after-hours boost on Nvidia’s blowout Q3 earnings
contentSnippet: Nvidia reported Q3 earnings and guidance above expectations, sending both the price of Bitcoin and mining stocks higher late Wednesday.

title: BlackRock files Delaware name registration for iShares Staked Ethereum ETF
contentSnippet: A Delaware name registration is one of the first public signals that a new exchange-traded fund is in the works.

title: Pro-Crypto CFTC Chair Nominee Won’t Commit to More Agency Resources or Dem Commissioners
contentSnippet: During a Senate confirmation hearing, Mike Selig declined to say the CFTC needs more resources to regulate crypto—despite bipartisan support on the issue.

title: New XRP and Dogecoin ETFs Expected to Begin Trading in the Coming Days
contentSnippet: New ETFs separately tracking XRP and Dogecoin could debut in the next three trading days, according to analysts.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.
